Data Embedding (Input)¶

Layer architecture¶

class nnlibs.embedding.models.Embedding(X_data=None, Y_data=None, relative_size=(2, 1, 1), batch_size=None, X_encode=False, Y_encode=False, X_scale=False)[source]¶

Bases: nnlibs.commons.models.Layer

Definition of an embedding layer prototype.

Parameters

  • dataset (list[list[list,list[int]]]) – Dataset containing samples features and label

  • X_dataset – Dataset containing samples features

  • Y_dataset – Dataset containing samples label

  • se_dataset (dict) – Settings for sets preparation

  • X_encode – Set to True to one-hot encode features

  • Y_encode – Set to True to one-hot encode labels

  • single (bool) – Set to True to run only with training set

  • X_scale (bool) – Normalize sample features within [0, 1]

compute_shapes(A)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.embedding.parameters.embedding_compute_shapes().

def embedding_compute_shapes(layer, A):
    """Compute forward shapes and dimensions for layer.
    """
    X = A    # Input of current layer of shape (m .. n)

    layer.fs['X'] = X.shape

    layer.d['m'] = layer.fs['X'][0]    #
    layer.d['n'] = layer.fs['X'][1]    #

    return None
forward(A)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.embedding.forward.embedding_forward().

def embedding_forward(layer, A):
    """Forward propagate signal to next layer.
    """
    # (1) Initialize cache
    X = initialize_forward(layer, A)

    layer.fc['A'] = A

    return A   # To next layer
backward(dA)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.embedding.backward.embedding_backward().

def embedding_backward(layer, dA):
    """Backward propagate error to previous layer.
    """
    # (1) Initialize cache
    dX = initialize_backward(layer, dA)

    dA = layer.bc['dA'] = dX

    return dA    # To previous layer
compute_gradients()[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.embedding.parameters.embedding_compute_gradients().

def embedding_compute_gradients(layer):
    """Compute gradients with respect to weight and bias for layer.
    """
    # No gradients to update for Embedding layer

    return None
